form.label: Data Location
form.description: Use the panels below to load network telemetry into the Analytics Engine for processing.

div.p: The application stores alerts within the main index by default. To optimize performance, you can store alerts within a particular index.
The status bar below reports whether alerts are being stored correctly. If you make changes to your configuration, this may take a few minutes to update.

AlphaSOC can summarize the destinations within your telemetry on a daily basis, and index that data within Splunk. This feature enables teams to quickly retrospectively search historic data for particular IP addresses and FQDNs. Use the settings below to enable and configure this feature.
Use the text input below to define the destination index for summary data.
The status bar below reports whether summary data is being stored correctly. If you make changes to your configuration, this may take a few minutes to update.

html.p: The application expects CIM compliant network events and should automatically ingest data. If you experience difficulties during setup and configuration, use the button below to download application logs, and submit the file to support@alphasoc.com for assistance.
